page.title: 17LAW & ORDER (LAMPHEY)
page.content: Until recently, Lamphey was fortunate to have the services of a local police man. He was based in Sageston but was responsible for the Lamphey/Hodgeston area as well. Now,however,Lamphey,like other rural areas,has to make do with periodic visits by mobile police officers. These officers visit Lamphey and the rest of the South Pembrokeshire rural community.There are three officers responsible for the area for regular policing.Traffic policemen visit the area as and when they are needed. All police services are based in Pembroke Dock
